title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting this image file from the outline image, and renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the image does not refresh.
EB: The image should refresh and display the updated content after renaming 'image2.jpg' to 'image1.jpg'.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 
2. Delete this image file from the outline image. 
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 
4. Observe if the image refreshes and displays the updated content.
